nodes.name: Send message and wait for response

conditions.rightValue: /(ai|artificial intelligence|machine learning|deep learning|data science|neural network|neural networks|nlp|natural language processing|computer vision|cv|genai|generative ai|transformer|gpt|bert|llm|agentic ai|autonomous agent|autonomous agents|openai|chatgpt|langchain|rpa|automation|predictive analytics|reinforcement learning|supervised learning|unsupervised learning|data analytics|data engineering|big data|mlops|model training|ai model)/i

parameters.text:
=You MUST always output meaningful content. 
Do NOT leave any field empty.

If no valid RSS articles are found in {{$json.data}}, then create an original AI industry insight post instead.

You will receive:
- Article list under {{$json.data}}
- Previously saved posts under {{$json.db_rows}}
- chat_memory table existence under {{$json.memory_check}}

Your tasks:

1. MEMORY TABLE SQL:
   - If {{$json.memory_check}} is false ‚Üí return the SQL to create the table.
   - If true ‚Üí return an empty string.
   Required schema:
     CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS chat_memory (
       id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
       title TEXT NOT NULL,
       content TEXT NOT NULL,
       created_at DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
     );

2. ARTICLE SELECTION:
   - If {{$json.data}} contains items ‚Üí choose the strongest one NOT found in {{$json.db_rows}}.
   - If NO valid items exist ‚Üí generate an original post topic about a major AI/ML trend.

3. LINKEDIN POST CREATION:
   - Generate:
     ‚Ä¢ Non-empty Unicode-bold title  
     ‚Ä¢ Non-empty text (150‚Äì220 words)  
     ‚Ä¢ 2‚Äì3 rhythm lines (emoji-led or dash-led)  
     ‚Ä¢ Natural use of max 3 emojis  
     ‚Ä¢ db_save.title and db_save.content must not be empty  
   - At the END of the post, include **12‚Äì15 trending hashtags**, relevant to the post theme (AI, ML, automation, generative AI, LLMs, tech trends, digital transformation, etc.)

4. Output STRICT JSON ONLY:
{
  "title": "ùêÅùê®ùê•ùêù ùêìùê¢ùê≠ùê•ùêû",
  "text": "Full LinkedIn post with 12‚Äì15 relevant hashtags at the end",
  "db_save": {
    "title": "Selected or generated title",
    "content": "Same LinkedIn post content"
  },
  "memory_table_sql": "<SQL or empty>"
}

Rules:
- All fields must contain non-empty values.
- Never leave any field empty.
- Never output placeholders.
- Never output markdown symbols.
- Output valid JSON ONLY.

options.systemMessage: You are an expert news analyst. Your task is to summarize the provided article into a single, concise paragraph (max 4 sentences). Do not include any introductory or concluding remarks
